au.com.noojee.acceloapi.cache

Enum AcceloCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<AcceloCache>
      • au.com.noojee.acceloapi.cache.AcceloCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<AcceloCache>

    public enum AcceloCache
extends Enum<AcceloCache>
    Manages the caching of queries when accessing the Accelo REST API. By default we hold 10,000 queries with a 10 minute expiry. When a query is run we also inject each of the individual entities that are returned into the cache so an access attempt by the entities id will return from cache. The cache is a singleton use AcceloCache.getInstance() to access it.
    Author:
    bsutton
